Module com.example.spacetravelapp
Package app.controller

Class ControllerUtility

java.lang.Object
app.controller.ControllerUtility
public class ControllerUtility extends Object
Contains all utility functions for generating the content into the View, switching scenes and displaying messages (pop-ups)
